name: GET_upload-tokens
description:
A delegated token is used to allow secure uploads without exposing your API key. Use this endpoint to retrieve a list of all currently active delegated tokens.
Tutorials using [delegated upload](https://api.video/blog/endpoints/delegated-upload).

sortBy.description: Allowed: createdAt, ttl. You can use these to sort by when a token was created, or how much longer the token will be active (ttl - time to live). Date and time is presented in ISO-8601 format.

sortOrder.description: Allowed: asc, desc. Ascending is 0-9 or A-Z. Descending is 9-0 or Z-A.

currentPage.description: Choose the number of search results to return per page. Minimum value: 1

pageSize.description: Results per page. Allowed values 1-100, default is 25.

$ul: **currentPageItems**: The number of items on the current page.
**itemsTotal**: Total number of items that exist.
**pageSize**: Maximum number of item per page.
**pagesTotal**: Number of items listed in the current page.
